```
docker service create --name my_app --secret my_secret openjdk:19-jdk-alpine
```

```
version: '3.1'
services:
  my_app:
    image: my_app:latest
    secrets:
     - my_external_secret
     - my_file_secret
secrets:
  my_external_secret:
    external: true
  my_file_secret:
    file: /path/to/secret/file.txt
```
